snippet.title: Release Trailer | Cardiac Powder
snippet.description:
Cardiac Powder is available now on @Steam!
A nervous twin stick shooter inspired by Hotline Miami x Crank! You have a bomb in you, if you can’t maintain a certain heart rate, it will explode… 
So keep you in action!

#IndieDevs #gamedev #indiegame #IndieGameDev

🛒Buy "Cardiac Powder" (greatly appreciated and helpful!): https://store.steampowered.com/app/2203570/Cardiac_Powder/

🔔 Subscribe to my YouTube Channel to follow my next project! 
🔔 Follow me on: https://twitter.com/edalbung

Music: "Technoir" Album by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio - Bandcamp - https://karlcasey.bandcamp.com/album/technoir - CC BY 3.0
